events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your website, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected and I would like to return it.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to keywords related to return and refund requests.
An available support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, could you confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging, and please share the order ID?
Yes, the jacket has not been worn except to try it on, and it’s still in the original packaging. My order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the details. We have approved your refund request. Please use the prepaid return label we will email you shortly to send the jacket back.
Thanks for your quick response. I appreciate receiving the prepaid label, this makes returning the jacket much easier.
We have processed your refund after receiving the returned jacket. The amount will be credited to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund credited back to your account. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As the refund has been completed to your satisfaction, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback is important to us.
